articles.title: Lawyer - Chiefs' Rashee Rice was driving Lamborghini in crash - ESPN
articles.description: Chiefs player Rashee Rice's attorney said Thursday that the wide receiver was one of the drivers of two speeding sports cars that caused a chain-reaction crash on a Dallas highway and then left the scene.
